sect1.title: Shape Concepts by General Attribute
sect1.para: The Shape Concepts by General Attribute Annotator allows users to select shapes for each specified attribute. In the following example we choose to show the shape of concepts based on the Taxonomy identifier. A few pre-steps are required here to know what Taxonomy identifier a concept actually holds. The item information panel can be used to show the Taxonomy identifier.

We enter 5476 as a Taxonomy_ID and select a shape of our choice. After clicking on "Annotate Graph" and clicking anywhere on the network, we can see the shape of the concepts we had checked is now modified to a star.

For a different Taxonomy identifier (5482), it is possible to select a different shape. Note: This requires a new annotator window. Adding another identifier to the same annotator window would make both identifiers shown with the same shape.
